item.title: The tenant of 25 Trowbridge Road is allowing fellow friend drug users crackheads in the building late at night at 22:50pm doing drugs. I was entering the block trying to head to my property and was disturbed by what I was seeing. This is been going on for sometime now if someone could please address this anti-social behavior., 20th August
item.description:
Drug users loitering in block late at night.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Trowbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking, 20th August
item.description:
Multiple vans parking both sides of the road for refurbishment of the old Prince of Wales pub making it tight for normal road users as its a blind bend and only 1 way can proceed past them at a time. They just need to move the vans to the side turning dont need 8 vans causing an obstruction
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Perry Rise, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking, 20th August
item.description:
Vehicles repeatedly ignoring no parking on the left side of kirkdale making it tight for buses to proceed through. Traffic wardens have attended but none could be bothered to ticket vehicles ignoring the parking restrictions

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 136, Kirkdale, Forest Hill, London

item.title: Parking, 20th August
item.description:
Bus lane is pointless as cars are parked up in there all hours of the day ignoring the loading restrictions needs enforcement or else just make it a car lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, London Road, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign for heavy vehicles going over bridge on footscray high street, 20th August
item.description:
Every few days we get heavy lorries that turn onto footscray high street. Only to then stop and try to turn around as the sign about the bridge is only at the lidl entrance. If there where signs along cray road then maybe these vehicles wouldn't have to attempt to try a very hard dangerous 3 point turn. Maybe if there was signs at the roundabout at crittles corner roundabout this would help. The sign that is on footscray high street at the lidl sign. Is totally blurry. I have many a day/night stopped traffic to assist the big lorries. This has been an issue since I moved here, that was 3 years ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maidstone Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
